entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IOException thrown when disk is full does not have correct hresult #100457
  • Task.Delay(timeout) completes before the specified timeout has expired #100455
  • Obsolete attribute impacts XML Serialization #100453
  • Shared framework .NET 8/.NET 9 applications and services randomly crash in real-world deployments #100452
  • System.AppContext.BaseDirectory returns path to directory content instead of path to directory #100448
  • [wasm] SignalR tests timing out #100445
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: BroadcastChannelWriter #100443
    Future
  • LdapConnection.GetPartialResults() fails with timeout in Linux #100442
  • System.IO.Tests crash in CI (Linux arm64) #100441
  • GetSpecialFolder on macOS returns incorrect folder locations #100440
  • Empty array allocated on the Frozen Heap for a Collectible type? #100437
    9.0.0
  • High probability of loading an Assembly with no Image #100435
  • [API Proposal]: System.Buffers : BuffersExtensions.AsStream #100434
  • [Question] How .Net application with dependencies works in Arm64 runtime/environment? #100432

Closed

  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\ComWrappers\\API\\ComWrappersTests\\ComWrappersTests.cmd #92200
  • Undefined behavior when the number of function parameters and the number of arguments does not match #99644
  • C4242 error when compiling CoreCLR on Windows with -msbuild #100207
    9.0.0
  • SDL signoff requirements - enable MSVC warnings C4242 and C4244 (libunwind) #99471
    9.0.0
  • StartTransportLayerSecurity(...) method throw an exception when using System.DirectoryServices.Protocols in version 8.0.0 on Linux #96988
  • .Net 4.8 HashAlgorithm.Initialize() is not called after as ICryptoTransform (i.e. in CryptoStream) thus providing incosistent experience (different hashes) #100438
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Enable SAFESEH #100430
  • Double.TryParse calculation result accuracy error in asp.net #99145
  • How to config the AOT compilation process #100232
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Change Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Environments fields to consts #100396

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: intial profild repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix "Cleanup some string operating functions" PR #100451
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][wbt] SignalRClientTests - wait for selectors of all the buttons #100450
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • FixOptRepeat and force repeating #100447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Weak interior handles #100446
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix allocation of empty array in the frozen heap for collectible types #100444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix intermittent failures due to unalignment access #100431
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Support Swift error handling for reverse P/Invokes #100429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [cdac] Data Descriptor Spec #100253
    documentation, area-Meta
  • JIT: fix count reconstruction when a natural loop contains an improper loop #100449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update dependson for mono perf jobs #100420
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reenable C4242 and C4244 warnings in libunwind #100241
    Security, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove requirement for building packs to run host tests and infrastructure around restoring test project assets #100324
    area-Host
  • Add more checking to `GenTreeArrAddr::ParseArrayAddress()` #100327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CA2022 warnings (Avoid inexact read with 'Stream.Read') #100352
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Add SAFESEH support to assembly files and ObjectWriter #100433
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make sure we compact the LOH when aggressive GC is requested #98954
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Dynamic event support #99862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #100417
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
  • JIT: Add separate ABI classifiers for x86/win-x64/SysV-x64/ARM64 #100276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix optAssertionProp_Update for IND of handle constant replacement #100422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Several improvements / simplifications in Regex #100315
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use SoftFP ABI on linux-bionic-arm #100392
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix for stress failure when adjusting effective IP while stackwalking may put it on a wrong instruction. #100376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make it possible to trim custom attribute artifacts #100395
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100426
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
